info.name: Restrict user settings
info.summary: Hide personal settings sections for non-admin users. Admins control visibility via checkboxes.
info.description: Hides options in Settings → User (Personal info, Notifications, Sharing, Appearance, Availability, Privacy) for non-admin users. Only Security with Devices & sessions can be shown. Admins configure visibility in Administration → Restrict user settings.
info.author: Custom
